title: How to Tell a Guy He's Handsome over Text

steps.title: A good morning text will start his day out right.
steps.content: A good morning text will start his day out right. If you wake up before him, send him a quick text telling him how handsome he is. He’ll probably appreciate the great start to his day, and he might even send you a cute good morning text back. [1] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. You could also say something like: [2] X Research source “Morning handsome! Hope you have a great day.” “Hey baby, just wanted to tell you how handsome you are. I hope you have a good day!”

steps.title: Tell him that he’s miles above anyone else you’ve ever dated.
steps.content: Tell him that he’s miles above anyone else you’ve ever dated. This exaggerated statement will let him know that you aren’t thinking about anyone else except for him. Plus, you’ll call him hot, which will probably make him feel really good. You might also say: [3] X Research source “You’re the most handsome man I’ve ever dated.” “I just can’t believe how handsome you are.”

steps.title: Tell him you miss him and just how handsome he is.
steps.content: Tell him you miss him and just how handsome he is. With this message, he’ll understand how much you care for him and how attractive you think he is. If you can’t see each other for a while or it’s been a little bit since you last hung out, this is a great message to send him. You could also try: [4] X Research source “It’s been too long since I’ve seen your pretty face.” “I can’t believe it’s been a month since I’ve seen your handsome face in person.”

steps.title: Follow up after a fun date or a hang out with him.
steps.content: Follow up after a fun date or a hang out with him. If you couldn’t quite work up the courage to let him know how hot he is in person, you can send it via text later on. Maybe he changed up his appearance, or maybe you’re just really enamoured with him. You could also say: [5] X Research source “I was too shy to say this in person, but you’re very handsome.” “Your outfit was so nice today. You looked very handsome.”

steps.title: Compliment a pic he posted or one he sent you.
steps.content: Compliment a pic he posted or one he sent you. If you think he looks good in it, tell him that! [6] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. He’ll be happy that you noticed, especially since guys don’t get complimented a lot. You could even comment on the pic if he put it up on social media. You could also text him something like: [7] X Research source “Wow, that picture you posted is so nice. You look amazing.” “You look so handsome in that pic.”

steps.title: Let him know you want to see his handsome face.
steps.content: Let him know you want to see his handsome face. If you two are long-distance or you can’t see each other for a while, this is a nice way to connect face to face. When he sends you the selfie, compliment him on his looks or how handsome he is. You might also say: [8] X Research source “I want to see that handsome face. Send me a selfie?” “I miss you. Send me a pic of your outfit today.”

steps.title: Send him a picture of you two that you really like.
steps.content: Send him a picture of you two that you really like. When you say that you’re a good-looking couple, you’re complimenting both of you at the same time. You’re also telling him that you think you two are a good fit, which is a great message to send to someone you like. You might also say: [9] X Research source “I’m so lucky to be with a handsome guy like you.” “We look so good in this picture (especially you).”

steps.title: Maybe your brain wanted to remind you how handsome he is.
steps.content: Maybe your brain wanted to remind you how handsome he is. If you had a nice dream about him last night, let him know all about it. Be sure to emphasize how good he looked so you can give him a compliment, too! You could also say: [10] X Research source “I had the craziest dream last night, but it was worth it because you looked so good in it.” “Wanna hear about my dream? You have the starring role!”

steps.title: If he’s trying out a beard, let him know that you like it.
steps.content: If he’s trying out a beard, let him know that you like it. Some guys get a little self-conscious when they try out new facial hair, so give him a boost of confidence with this compliment. He’ll be happy that you noticed, and it might even convince him not to shave for a few more days. You could also try: [11] X Research source “I like the beard, you should keep it! Makes you look rugged and handsome.” “Trying out a beard, huh? I like it!”

steps.title: If he mixed it up, let him know you like it.
steps.content: If he mixed it up, let him know you like it. Maybe he got a haircut or got some highlights done. Whatever the case is, tell him that you thought his hair looked good to make him smile. This is especially a good idea if his hair is a big part of his overall look. You might also text him: [12] X Research source “Did you do something different with your hair today? It looked so good.” “Forgot to tell you earlier, but your hair looked great today.” “I love your haircut! You look so handsome.”

steps.title: Pick a celebrity that he vaguely looks like.
steps.content: Pick a celebrity that he vaguely looks like. Even if they aren’t identical, a comparison will make him feel great (especially if he thinks that celebrity is attractive). Although he might try to brush it off, he’ll appreciate that you think he looks like a famous person. You could also say: [13] X Research source “Your new haircut makes you look just like Harry Styles. I love it!” “You’re so handsome, people are going to start mistaking you for Brad Pitt!”

steps.title: If you liked his outfit, tell him about it.
steps.content: If you liked his outfit, tell him about it. Maybe you were too shy to bring it up in person, or maybe you didn’t really think about it until you got home. If you saw him earlier and he looked really good, tell him about it over text. You could also say: [14] X Research source “Your whole outfit was really nice today. You looked very handsome.” “I loved the shirt you were wearing earlier. You can pull off anything.”
